system.description: You have spent a considerable amount of time researching spells and increasing your repertoire, and are even able to prepare some of your spells from memory without the need for a spellbook. Add a number of extra spells to your spellbook equal to your Smarts. These spells can be of any rank you are capable of casting. Select a number of spells from your spellbook equal to your Smarts. You can prepare these spells from memory without your spellbook. Whenever you increase your Wizard caster rank, you may change up to half of these spells if you wish. Both of these benefits are retroactive if you later increase your Smarts.
